DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IV , single-blind , randomize , two-arm study explore pharmacodynamics effect RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) neutrophil redistribution , function survival healthy subject . Subjects receive either single dose intravenous ( IV ) RoActemra/Actemra dose 8 mg/kg one hour study Day 0 placebo . Neutrophil kinetics data collect subject Day 10 study . Following last study visit Day 10 , subject attend two safety follow-up visit Day 28 Day 56 .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacodynamic Study Evaluate Neutrophil Distribution Kinetics Function Following Single-Dose RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male age 18 65 year inclusive Healthy determine screen assessment Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive Nonsmoker Must agree use barrier method contraception supplement spermicide treatment period least 150 day last dose study drug Participation clinical study investigational drug within 3 month least 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior dose Current past history smoking within 6 month Previous exposure therapeutic monoclonal antibody past 6 month prior screen Current clinically significant history condition , opinion investigator , would : place subject undue risk ; invalidate give informed consent ; interfere PK PD data ; interfere ability subject complete study History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction humanize murine monoclonal antibody Any recurrent infection ; infection require antibiotic treatment 6 week prior dose ; mononucleosis 6 month prior dose ; know HIV , Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C ; active infection time screen Active tuberculosis ( TB ) require treatment within previous 3 year . Evidence active malignant disease , malignancy diagnose within previous 10 year ( except basal cell carcinoma skin excise cure ) , breast cancer diagnose within previous 20 year Primary secondary immunodeficiency Autoimmune disease Use dependence substance abuse Alcohol abuse average weekly intake great 2 unit per day Screening baseline rest heart rate < 45 > 90 beat per minute Major surgery within 8 week prior screen Major illness 3 month prior dose Biliary obstruction Current past history diverticulitis
